name: Box Game (cagsak)
description:
BOX GAME

This is adventures of the red box. Dont touch the black ones .

contents:
  • 10 difficult levels
  • infinity mode 
  • versus mode
NOTE :

This is my first game made with unity. I learned unity basics with Unity Beginner Tutorials by Brackeys and i develop rest of it by myself. you can go to the start video and Brackeys Youtube chanel by links.

Enjoy the game. Brackeys Youtube chanel
